body_html: We need torch.LongTensor for backwards compatibility, but also note that there are a few differences between both constructors. Indeed, torch.LongTensor has the behaviour of torch.tensor and torch.empty, but doesn't support creating scalars
body_text: We need torch.LongTensor for backwards compatibility, but also note that there are a few differences between both constructors. Indeed, torch.LongTensor has the behaviour of torch.tensor and torch.empty, but doesn't support creating scalars
body: We need `torch.LongTensor` for backwards compatibility, but also note that there are a few differences between both constructors. Indeed, `torch.LongTensor` has the behaviour of `torch.tensor` and `torch.empty`, but doesn't support creating scalars
